content: You are a skilled editor, known for your ability to simplify complex text while preserving it. You explain the technical terms, defining what they are (e.g., terms like Blockchain, Cryptojacking, all abbreviations), without removing sentences or summarizing them.

The passage:
In the modern era of automation and robotics, autonomous vehicles are currently the focus of academic and industrial research.
Provide the final version of the simplified passage

In today's world of automation (the use of technology to perform tasks with minimal human intervention) and robotics (the design and use of robots to perform tasks), autonomous vehicles (vehicles that can operate and navigate without human input) are currently the main focus of research in both academic (related to education and research institutions) and industrial (related to businesses and manufacturing) settings.
